data.title: Donald Trump ni we agiye kuba umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika agira 47
data.description: Umurepubulikani Donald Trump yashoboye kuronka amajwi arengeye ayo yarondera kugira ngo atsinde ano matora, akaba ari agiye kuramutswa igihugu, atsinze Umudemokarate Kamala Harris.

Hampande y'umukuru w'igihugu, habaye kandi n'amatora y'abashingamateka: Nk’uko bigenda buri myaka ibiri, abanyagihugu baratora kandi abashingamateka 435, ubu Abarepubulikani ni bo biganje mu nama nshingamateka ihari ubu.

Inyuma y’uko ibiharuro
vyo mu ntara ya Wisconsin, iyindi ntara mahindagu, ifise intebe 10  hamwe na Alaska ifise intebe 3, bihereye intebe 13 Donald
Trump, aciye arenza amajwi 270 yarondera kugira ngo atsinde, ubu akaba agize
279.

Inyuma y’uko ibiharuro
vyo mu ntara ya Wisconsin, iyindi ntara mahindagu, ifise intebe 10  hamwe na Alaska ifise intebe 3, bihereye intebe 13 Donald
Trump, aciye arenza amajwi 270 yarondera kugira ngo atsinde, ubu akaba agize
279.

Aya majwi amuhaye
itsinzi itaziguye muri ano matora y’umukuru w’igihugu yabaye ejo ku wa 5 Munyonyo
2024, akaba agiye kuba umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika agira 47.

Aya majwi amuhaye
itsinzi itaziguye muri ano matora y’umukuru w’igihugu yabaye ejo ku wa 5 Munyonyo
2024, akaba agiye kuba umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika agira 47.

Donald
Trump asubiye kubikora, inyuma y’imyaka umunani yirahiye Hillary Clinton mu
bintu abatari bake batari biteze, yongeye gutsinda uwundi mugore yahiganwa
nawe.

Donald Trump: Menya uno mutunzi ruhebwa yamaze gutangaza ko yatsindiye ikiringo kigira kabiri co kurongora Amerika
Donald Trump: Menya uno mutunzi ruhebwa yamaze gutangaza ko yatsindiye ikiringo kigira kabiri co kurongora Amerika
Trump
Trump
Kuva na kera imbere y'uko agerageza kurondera kwiyamamariza kuba umukuru w'igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika incuro zitatu zose, Donald Trump yari we mutunzi wa mbere yavugwa cane muri Amerika.
Kuva na kera imbere y'uko agerageza kurondera kwiyamamariza kuba umukuru w'igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika incuro zitatu zose, Donald Trump yari we mutunzi wa mbere yavugwa cane muri Amerika.

Ubuzima bw'uno mutunzi ruhebwa w'i New York yari yashize imitahe yiwe mu nyubakwa bwaramamaye cane mu binyamakuru no ku mboneshakure mu myaka mirongo imbere y'uko, mu buryo butari bwitezwe mu 2015-16, agenwa kwitoreza ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu kw'izina ry'Abarepubulikani.

Ubuzima bw'uno mutunzi ruhebwa w'i New York yari yashize imitahe yiwe mu nyubakwa bwaramamaye cane mu binyamakuru no ku mboneshakure mu myaka mirongo imbere y'uko, mu buryo butari bwitezwe mu 2015-16, agenwa kwitoreza ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu kw'izina ry'Abarepubulikani.

Izina ryiwe ryari rizwi cane n'ukwirekura mu mvugo kwiwe mu myiyamamazo vyaramufashije kwiganzura abanyaporitike bari rurangiranwa - ariko impari zaranze ubutegetsi bwiwe zatumye atongerwa ikiringo kigira kabiri. Fyonda ng'aha ubandanye usoma ino nkuru

Izina ryiwe ryari rizwi cane n'ukwirekura mu mvugo kwiwe mu myiyamamazo vyaramufashije kwiganzura abanyaporitike bari rurangiranwa - ariko impari zaranze ubutegetsi bwiwe zatumye atongerwa ikiringo kigira kabiri.
Fyonda ng'aha ubandanye usoma ino nkuru

Umugore wa mbere yabaye icegera ca prezida muri Amerika afise vyinshi bimuranga
Umugore wa mbere yabaye icegera ca prezida muri Amerika afise vyinshi bimuranga
Harris
Harris
Vyafashe umwanya udashika n'isaha inyuma y'ingingo ya Biden yo gukura meza kugira aba Demokrate batangure kwiyamamariza Kamala Harris nk'umukandida mushasha w'umugambwe wabo mu matora yo mu 2024.
Vyafashe umwanya udashika n'isaha inyuma y'ingingo ya Biden yo gukura meza kugira aba Demokrate batangure kwiyamamariza Kamala Harris nk'umukandida mushasha w'umugambwe wabo mu matora yo mu 2024.

Mu gihe icegera ca prezida wa Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ashaka kuba umugore wa mbere agiye mu kibanza ca prezida, imyiyamamazo yiwe yahaye inguvu abari bacitse intege, ica n'umuhigo w'intererano yegeranijwe igera ku madorari imiriyoni 671 mu mezi abiri aheze - hafi incuro zitatu z'ayo uwo bahanganye w'umu Republikani, Donald Trump yaronse.

Mu gihe icegera ca prezida wa Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ashaka kuba umugore wa mbere agiye mu kibanza ca prezida, imyiyamamazo yiwe yahaye inguvu abari bacitse intege, ica n'umuhigo w'intererano yegeranijwe igera ku madorari imiriyoni 671 mu mezi abiri aheze - hafi incuro zitatu z'ayo uwo bahanganye w'umu Republikani, Donald Trump yaronse.

Ariko gushika mu kibanza ca mbere ku rutonde vyabaye ntagereranywa, imitego myinshi hamwe n'ibibazo vy'urusobe. Ng'aya amabanga Harris yagiye ararangura, ivyaranze ubuzima bwiwe n'ingene yabaye umugore wa mbere w'umwirabure yitoje mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu. Fyonda hano usome inkuru iramvuye

Trump na Harris bakiri abana
Trump na Harris bakiri abana

Mu gihe cyo kwiyamamaza cyose, abatora babonye amafoto menshi y’aba bakandida babiri – bavuga imbwirwaruhame, basuhuza abaje muri za mitingi zabo cyangwa bururuka mu ndege. Aya ni amafoto atandukanye y’abo ari bo n’aho bavuye.

Mu gihe cyo kwiyamamaza cyose, abatora babonye amafoto menshi y’aba bakandida babiri – bavuga imbwirwaruhame, basuhuza abaje muri za mitingi zabo cyangwa bururuka mu ndege. Aya ni amafoto atandukanye y’abo ari bo n’aho bavuye.
Mbere cyane y’uko banamenya icyo White House ari cyo… ku ifoto ibanza ni Kamala Harris na Donald Trump bombi bafite imyaka itatu.

Mu myaka mirongo barutana, Harris yabaye imyaka ye y’ibanze i Oakland muri California, naho Trump yakuriye mu gace ka Queens muri New York.

Mu mirwi imwe imwe y’umugambwe w’abademokarate, igikorwa co kwirimbura kiza catanguye nubwo ibiharuro bitaradadanura ibintu burundu.
Mu mirwi imwe imwe y’umugambwe w’abademokarate, igikorwa co kwirimbura kiza catanguye nubwo ibiharuro bitaradadanura ibintu burundu.
Umwe mu bategetsi b’uno mugambwe avuga ko umugambwe "ukeneye kwikurako abanyapolitike b’i Washington bigira incabwenge bishira hejuru kugira ngo utangure gushasha".
Umwe mu bategetsi b’uno mugambwe avuga ko umugambwe "ukeneye kwikurako abanyapolitike b’i Washington bigira incabwenge bishira hejuru kugira ngo utangure gushasha".

Eka n’abandi ni uko bavuga, nubwo bageguza – aho bavuga ko naho bashima utwigoro twakoze mu myiyamamazo, bumva ko umugambwe wabo ufise ‘ingorane y’ishusho’ mu gihe vya nkenerwa mu buzima bwa misi yose, nk’ikibazo c’ubuzima buzimvye, ari vyo biraje ishinga abatora hafi bose.

Eka n’abandi ni uko bavuga, nubwo bageguza – aho bavuga ko naho bashima utwigoro twakoze mu myiyamamazo, bumva ko umugambwe wabo ufise ‘ingorane y’ishusho’ mu gihe vya nkenerwa mu buzima bwa misi yose, nk’ikibazo c’ubuzima buzimvye, ari vyo biraje ishinga abatora hafi bose.

Ukwo kwihebura kw’abademokarate kwibutsa amajambo yavuzwe n’umunyarepubulika  abwira umunyamakuru wa BBC igihe kimwe mu myiyamamazo ya Trump, aho yavuze ko  umukandida wabo “yahaye ishusho nshasha” umugambwe w’Abarepubulikani aho yawuvanye mu biyita ko ari bo ba kibirengeye mu gihugu akawushikana mur bantu batobato, mu gihe Abademokarate bobo babaye “umugambwe wa Hollywood".

Ukwo kwihebura kw’abademokarate kwibutsa amajambo yavuzwe n’umunyarepubulika  abwira umunyamakuru wa BBC igihe kimwe mu myiyamamazo ya Trump, aho yavuze ko  umukandida wabo “yahaye ishusho nshasha” umugambwe w’Abarepubulikani aho yawuvanye mu biyita ko ari bo ba kibirengeye mu gihugu akawushikana mur bantu batobato, mu gihe Abademokarate bobo babaye “umugambwe wa Hollywood".

Donald Trump yamaze kwizigira intsinzi akaba ariko ashikiriza ijambo, aho avuga ati: "Tugiye gufasha igihugu cacu gukira".

Ati: “Iyi ni intsinzi ikomeye cane ku Banyamerika izotuma dusubira gukomeza Amerika”, akoresheje invugo yiwe y’itora n’amajambo y’intangamarara.
Ati: “Iyi ni intsinzi ikomeye cane ku Banyamerika izotuma dusubira gukomeza Amerika”, akoresheje invugo yiwe y’itora n’amajambo y’intangamarara.

Muri iri jambo ryiwe, avuga kandi ko agiye gutorera umuti ikibazo c’imbibe, akongerako ko we n’umugambwe wiwe banditse amateka.

Trump abandanya avuga ko ibibaye bigiye kuba “umwaka ntibagiranwa” kuri Amerika.
Trump abandanya avuga ko ibibaye bigiye kuba “umwaka ntibagiranwa” kuri Amerika.

Nubwo atarashikana amajwi asabwa kugira ngo abe yatsinze, ibiharuro biramuha amahirwe yose, aho mu majwi 270 akeneye abuzemwo ane gusa, ni ukuvuga ko afise 266, mu gihe Kamala Harris we agise 219. Mu biharuro bitarahera muri za ntara mahindagu zisigaye, Trump ari imbere cane muri zose ku rugero runini rw'amwajwi amaze guharurwa, ku buryo Harris ataco yoba acizera.

Mu biharuro bitarahera muri za ntara mahindagu zisigaye, Trump ari imbere cane muri zose ku rugero runini rw'amwajwi amaze guharurwa, ku buryo Harris ataco yoba acizera.

Inyuma yo gutsindira
intara mahindagu ikomeye ya Pennsylvania, Donald Trump yegereje cane igitigiri
gikenewe c’intege 270 zikenewe mu ntumwa z’itora (collège électoral/electoral
college)  kugira ngo atsinde amatora.

intara mahindagu ikomeye ya Pennsylvania, Donald Trump yegereje cane igitigiri
gikenewe c’intege 270 zikenewe mu ntumwa z’itora (collège électoral/electoral
college)  kugira ngo atsinde amatora.

Mu gihe yari
amaze gushikana 246, iyi ntara ya Pennsylvania ifise intebe 19, abenshi bafata
ko uwuyitsindiye aba afise amahirwe yo gutsinda, itumye aronka 265.

Nubwo ari kure cane mu majwi, Kamala Harris we ntarahebura. Avuga ko akirindiriye ko amajwi yose aharurwa, cane cane muri za ntara mahingadu, Donald Trump akaba amaze gutsindwamwo zibiri: Georgia na Caroline du Nord.  Hagati aho, abanywanyi biwe bobo batanguye umunezero.

Abademokarate batakaje intebe zibiri mu nama nkenguzamateka, inyuma y’uko
umukenguzamateka Sherrod Brown wo muri Ohio atsinzwe, ibi bikaba biriko
vyambura amahirwe uno mugambwe wo kubandanya ufise mu minwe inama
nkenguzamateka.

Abademokarate batakaje intebe zibiri mu nama nkenguzamateka, inyuma y’uko
umukenguzamateka Sherrod Brown wo muri Ohio atsinzwe, ibi bikaba biriko
vyambura amahirwe uno mugambwe wo kubandanya ufise mu minwe inama
nkenguzamateka.

Uno mugambwe umaze gutakaza intebe zibiri –
n’iya gatatu ya Jon Tester i Montana – ikaba igeze ahatemba. Hatabaye uwundi
mudemokarate atsinda mu yindi ntara, iyi nama nkenguzamateka izoba ikorokeye mu
miwe y’Abarepubulikani.

Gushika
ubu, biragoye kuronka ahandi hantu Abademokarate boronkera icizere. Ni mu gihe
aba Bademokarate badahagaze neza mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu, aho gushika ubu
Donald Trump, Umurepubulikani, ari imbere cane ku majwi 230, mu gihe Kamala
Harris, inyuma yo gutsinda muri Virginia ifise intebe 13, ashikanye amajwi 182.

Mu gihe ibiharuro bibandanya biduga umwanya ku mwanya, abanywanyi ba Donald Trump bafise icizere kinini intsinzi ari rwabo, abanywanyi na Kamala Harris nabo bakaba bijiriwe.
Mu gihe ibiharuro bibandanya biduga umwanya ku mwanya, abanywanyi ba Donald Trump bafise icizere kinini intsinzi ari rwabo, abanywanyi na Kamala Harris nabo bakaba bijiriwe.

Gushika ubu, ibiharo vyerekana ko Trump ahejeje gutsinda mu ntara imwe mahindagu, Caroline du Nord ifise intebe 16, akaba ashikanye amajwi 230, ubu akaba abura 40 gusa kugira ngo ashikane 270 akeneye.

ibiharuro vyerekanye ko Kamala Harris yatsinze muri California ifise intebe 54,
na Oregon ifise intebe 8, ibitigiri vyiwe vyaduze gushika kuri 153, ariko
intambwe iracari ndende kugira ashikire Donald Trump afise gushika ubu 211.

Mu gihe ibiharuro vyerekana ko Donald Trump yatsinze muri Iowa na Kansas zifise intebe 6 imw'imwe, maze ubu akaba ashikana intebe 207, muri za ntara mahindagu ibiharuro ntibiratungana.

Intara zirenga 40 kuri 50 zimaze kurangiza amatora
Intara zirenga 40 kuri 50 zimaze kurangiza amatora

Mu gihe
intara zirenga 40 kuri 50 zimaze kwugara ibiro vy’amatora kugira ngo zitangure
guharura, ibiharuro birabandanya bisohoka bukebuke, aho Donald Trump abandanya
atera intambwe.

Mu gihe
intara zirenga 40 kuri 50 zimaze kwugara ibiro vy’amatora kugira ngo zitangure
guharura, ibiharuro birabandanya bisohoka bukebuke, aho Donald Trump abandanya
atera intambwe.

Ibiharuro
birerekana ko yatsinze mu ntara za Montana ifise intebe 4, Utah
ifise intebe 6, Ohio ifise intene 17, mu gihe kandi aboneka ko ashobora gutsinda muri Mississippi
ifise intebe 4. Gushika ubu, amaze gushikana 195, mu gihe uwo bahiganwa, Kamala Harris ashikanye 91, inyuma yo gutsinda muri Colorado ifise intebe 10.  Mu ntara ya Georgia, mu gihe ibice barenga 80% vy’amajwi bimaze
guharurwa, Turmp aracari imbere ku majwi 51.9%.

yatsinze mu ntara za New York ifise intebe 28,  Delaware ifise intebe 3, hamwe na Rhode Island ifise intebe 4, izi zose hamwe zikaba zije kwiyongera kuri 27 yari agifise.

intara iri mu bumanuko bw’igihugu ni intara y’Abarepubulikani kandi mu matora y’umukuru
w’igihugu atanu aheruka, uno mugambwe ni wo wamye utsinda.
